name: ChainMail
description:
Don't Stop Reading! What if sometimes the mail we dismiss as Junk was telling the truth?

---

ChainMail is a short visual novel about forwarding on chain letters without considering the consequences.. 

The game is a short story primarily told via email conversations held by Robert 'Bob' Forrest and his friend Dave Hudson .

---

Completed during the month of September for the Spooktober 2020 Game Jam.
